text: Thieves by Law, or Ganavim Ba Hok is a 2010 documentary film charting the rise of Russian organized crime in the wake of the fall of the Soviet Union. In the film several noted crime figures are interviewed, a number of which are currently wanted by Interpol.Doc "Thieves by Law" Steals Hurrahs at Tribeca ==References== ==External links== * Category:Israeli films Category:Israeli documentary films Category:2010 films Category:German films Category:Documentary films about organized crime in Russia Category:Russian- language films Category:Hebrew-language films Category:Thieves in law Category:2010 documentary films Category:Works about the Russian Mafia
title: Thieves by Law
